machine_ip.name: Machine IP Address
machine_ip.description: The IP address or hostname of your Meticulous Espresso machine (e.g., 192.168.1.100 or meticulous.local)

socket_io_throttle_interval.name: Chatty Sensor Throttle Interval
socket_io_throttle_interval.description: How long to wait between Socket.IO sensor updates (in seconds, 1-10). Prevents MQTT flooding from chatty sensors like pressure and temperature. Each sensor tracked independently. (Default: 2)

stale_data_refresh_interval.name: Stale Data Refresh Interval
stale_data_refresh_interval.description: Force a full refresh of all sensor data after this time with no updates (in hours, 1-168). Ensures non-chatty sensors (settings, statistics, profile info) are periodically refreshed so Home Assistant doesn't forget them. (Default: 24)

debug.name: Debug Mode
debug.description: Enable detailed debug logging for troubleshooting. (Default: false)

mqtt_enabled.name: Enable MQTT
mqtt_enabled.description: Publish sensors via MQTT discovery (recommended). (Default: true)

mqtt_username.name: MQTT Username
mqtt_username.description: Optional username for MQTT broker (auto-detected from HA MQTT integration). (Default: empty)

mqtt_password.name: MQTT Password
mqtt_password.description: Optional password for MQTT broker (auto-detected from HA MQTT integration). (Default: empty)
